title: exosome_24hr_0ug/ml_ome
treatment_protocol_ch1: SGC-7901 cells were treated with PBS or 80ug/ml omeprazole and cultured in RPMI-1640 medium (Gibco, USA) supplemented with 10% exosome-free FBS (Gibco, USA) and then incubated with for 24 hours at 37 oC in a humidified incubator with 5% CO2.
growth_protocol_ch1: SGC-7901 cells were cultured in RPMI-1640 medium (Gibco, USA) supplemented with 10% fetal calf serum (Gibco, USA) at 37˚C in a humidified atmosphere containing 5% CO2.
extract_protocol_ch1: The medium of SGC-7901 cells were collected and the exosomes were isolated by ExoQuick-TC exosome precipitation solution (System Bioscience, USA)  according to the manufacturer's instructions. Then the miRNA involved in exosomes was isolated by the total RNA purification Kit (Norgen, USA) according to the manufacturer's instructions.
label_protocol_ch1: Equal amount of  small RNA (defined by Agilent bioanalyzer pico assay) was labeled with Cyanine3 (Cy3) according to the manufacturer's instructions.
hyb_protocol: Cy3 labeled RNA re-suspended in hybridization buffer and hybridized to the array platform overnight (20 hours) at 55 °C in a rotating Agilent hybridization oven using Agilent's recommended hybridization chamber.
scan_protocol: Fluorescence signals after hybridization were detected with a DNA microarray scanner G2505C (Agilent Technologies) using one color scan setting for 8 × 60 K array slides (Scan Area 61 × 21.6 mm, Scan resolution 2 μm, Dye channel is set to Green and Green PMT is set to 100%).
description: miRNA expression in exosomes from medium of SGC-7901 cells after 24hr in 0ug/ml omeprazole treatment
data_processing: In order to obtain background subtracted and outlier rejected signal intensities, the scanned microarray images were analyzed and processed with the Agilent feature extraction software (v10.7.3.1) using default parameters (Grid: 046064_D_20121223).
